name: Sprint 01 Project (sa977)
description:
Left Click: Deletes objects. (Click for single object; hold for continuous deletion).

Right Click: Spawns objects. (Click for single object; hold for continuous spawning).

A painting tool that creates and deletes 3D objects with mouse clicks. User can change the shape, color, and distance of the objects they spawn. They can also toggle the option of automatically destroying the objects after a few seconds; and even destroy all at once with a single button press.
